name: aeronest
description: Aeronest is a modern, airy platform for booking unique stays, homestays, and PGs across the globe. Inspired by the freedom of the skies (Aero) and the warmth of a home (Nest), Aeronest offers travelers a perfect balance of comfort and adventure. Whether you're flying solo, on a business trip, or settling into a new city, Aeronest is your cozy launchpad.
author: Shariq Mirza
